pages.text: I have had a horrible idea. This $(key)grief$() could be weaponized against those who would try to harm me. By crafting an arrow with $(item)Netherite$() and $(item)Sporebrush$(), I could inflict Grief upon anyone I choose.$(br)$(br)...Why would I do that to someone else?
Using these arrows could be $(key)very risky$() - even holding them to prepare to fire will inflict that $(key)grief$() upon me as well. Nevertheless, they are an option if I become desperate.
